name: digital-entity
title: DigitalEntity
description: A digital manifestation of an entity.

fields.name: digitalEntityID
fields.description: The unique identifier for a DigitalEntity.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: digitalEntityType
fields.description: The category that best matches the nature of the DigitalEntity.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: parentDigitalEntityID
fields.description: The identifier for the DigitalEntity that was the source of this DigitalEntity.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: materialEntityID
fields.description: The identifier for the MaterialEntity that is the subject of this DigitalEntity.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: gatheringEventID
fields.description: The identifier for the GatheringEvent in which this DigitalEntity was created.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: acceptedIdentificationID
fields.description: The identifier for the preferred Identification (if any) for the Organism that was the subject of this DigitalEntity.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: datasetID
fields.description: The identifier for the data set from which the DigitalEntity record originated.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: organismID
fields.description: The identifier for the Organism (if any) that was the subject of the GatheringEvent.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: accessURI
fields.description: A URI that uniquely identifies a service that provides a representation of the DigitalEntity.

fields.name: webStatement
fields.description: A URL defining or further elaborating on the license statement (e.g., a web page explaining the precise terms of use).

fields.name: format
fields.description: A string describing the technical format (file format or physical medium) of the DigitalEntity.

fields.name: license
fields.description: The license or waiver under which the DigitalEntity is shared.

fields.name: rights
fields.description: The rights reserved with respect to the DigitalEntity.

fields.name: rightsURI
fields.description: The URI to the statement about the rights reserved with respect to the DigitalEntity.

fields.name: accessRights
fields.description: The statement of rights with respect to access to the DigitalEntity.

fields.name: Owner
fields.description: The Agent who holds the rights over the DigitalEntity.

fields.name: source
fields.description: A string providing an identifiable source from which the DigitalEntity was derived.

fields.name: sourceURI
fields.description: A URI providing an identifiable source from which the DigitalEntity was derived.

fields.name: creator
fields.description: The Agent responsible for the creation of the DigitalEntity.

fields.name: createdDate
fields.description: The date on which the DigitalEntity was created.

fields.name: modified
fields.description: The date on which the DigitalEntity was most recently modified.

fields.name: language
fields.description: The ISO639-2 three-letter language code (if any) in which the content of the DigitalEntity is recorded.

fields.name: bibliographicCitation
fields.description: The preferred citation for the DigitalEntity.
